website_summaries.verdict: This sleek, modern handbag looks good and is easy to carry.
pros: Besides adding a dash of style, the turning clasp of this bag closes more securely than the more frequently-seen Velcro closures
Offers a removable shoulder strap and cross-body strap sewn into the purse body
Stitching along the seams appears secure
The bag has plenty of room for your essentials like wallet, lipstick, keys, and smartphone
cons: With much use or carrying a lot of weight, the PVC strap may break
Like all plastic accessories, the bag may seem stiff

customer_reviews.title: Great purse and price
customer_reviews.text: This purse is an awesome value! I wanted purse that met stadium bag policy requirements, was functional (big enough!), could be used more than once, and - dare I say - trendy. I just really like it. I used a strap from an old purse, which made it feel a little classier and more comfortable IMO. Sorry this isn’t the greatest picture (the purse is turned backwards, doh) but you get a size reference. Will be worn again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size like
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on 4/17 and it arrived on 4/21 thru amazon prime. Fast shipping. This is perfect size for me. Good alternative for Pochette Metis during rainy days. Plastic is sturdy. But when I opened it... it has some sort of water marks. Don’t worry, it will disappear in two days. I use a twilly to wrap the handle and use my pochette metis strap. It is so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: vnusa2

customer_reviews.title: Works great for concerts!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is bigger than I thought. For ARMY attending bts’s stadium tour this bag will fit your lightstick, just need to force it down since it is plastic. The only downfall are the straps but they are clip on so you can change them.
customer_reviews.author: Soobunny6ix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This clear bag is what I really need. Perfect size. It can fit all my essentials including my fave makeup prouducts. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gooddealscatcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking game day bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really ice looking. I love that the strap is clear, it's easy to get inside, and it keeps its shape. It is actually more spacious than I need. The only downside is that the metal hardware could scratch your phone or glasses case or other fragile items inside the bag... and the bag looks almost too nice to wear to a game.The strap could be longer, to be worn as a crossbody, but since it's removable you can also just supply your own strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I liked the clasp over other bags with snap closure because ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was inexpensive and is very high quality. It was large enough for me to carry anything I needed during the game as well as items for my 3 friends. The cross body strap is very secure and the bag is made well. I liked the clasp over other bags with snap closure because I could pack it full and it still sealed securely. I even had a drink spilled on me and everything in the bag kept dry :) great purchase and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and flawless
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much . Girls! Buy it ! I ordered @9pm and received it by 12pm the next day! Beautiful clear color , Gold turn lock closure . Comes with the clear cross body strap, I’m 5,1-5’2 and stops at my hips. No weird smell , came in a light dust bag . Just perfect 👌
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet. Got it to meet NFL stadium requirements for bags and I’m pleasantly surprised! Cute size, not too big or small. Clasp is easy to function, the strap is shorter but still long enough to wear it cross body. Glad I opted for this than the not so cute cargo plastic bags with not so cute trim. Fingers crossed it hold well, I would actually use this bag other places! It’s worth the few extra bucks!
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: Happy! Everyone's
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I had cancelled a previous order from a different brand after reading the online reviews of the clear plastic bag leaching and smelling like very strong plastic chemicals. I am very happy with this purchase. The clear bag by Hoxis is of great quality, affordable, and the durability of the clear plastic is strong. I would definitely consider buying a different style and would definitely recommend this brand/product for anyone shopping for a clear plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Spyder05

customer_reviews.title: Trusty purse!
customer_reviews.text: I worked for a corporate retail giant that makes their employees carry clear purses into work and this bag was perfect! It held up to 6 months of daily use with no structural wear and tear. The straps stayed strong, the seams never failed, and the lock always worked. Plus an excellent price point! Most of the employees there hated their clear purses, but they all asked me where I got mine! I sent them this way and they all loved it! Several people asked if they could have my purse when I left that job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ❤️ LOVE ❤️
customer_reviews.text: During this pandemic I wanted something I could clean with disinfectant wipes and not harm the material and this is prefect. It’s sturdy, the strap is long enough for crossbody fit. I purchased plastic travel pouches that fit nicely on the inside to hold key, extra wipes and gloves and whatever. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: eAngel

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile to make it your own look.
customer_reviews.text: This clear purse is very classy for a plastic purse. I bought a leather crossbody strap that was part chain and the gold metal matched the metal on the purse. I had placed my phone on the inside (body) side so I could periodically glance at it without having to take it out of the purse. I also added a small silk neckerchief amongst the items in my purse to complete the look. The silk scarf can also be wrapped around the handle for a nice effect. You cannot go wrong with this bag. It is very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cleal Stadium Purse
customer_reviews.text: This purse is gorgeous! Perfect size for going to the game and needing a little room for goodies. Sunglasses, small wallet phone, lipgloss and etc. Well made and very stylish! The shoulder strap is the perfect width to stay on your shoulder and is the perfect length to use on your shoulder or to use as a crossbody bag. Guess you can tell I'm really happy with my purchase of the bag. More then I had hoped for when looking for a bag to take to the game!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Was very happy with the size
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with the size, perfect for football games since the bags have to be clear! The gold hardware looks great in person and had protective covering over all of it when it arrived. Not cheap or flimsy at all. Nice & sturdy. So happy with this purchase, especially because of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for places with clear bag policies
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for places with clear bag policies. It is pretty roomy and the clasp works well. It looks fashionable and I received lots of compliments on it from friends. It is a nice upgrade from a clear backpack. I'd definitely recommend this is if you are looking for a cute and practical bag that won't get you kicked out of a concert/game/festival.
customer_reviews.author: Former New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: A Great Stadium Purse!
customer_reviews.text: This purse is very cute & versatile. I am not a fan of everyone being able to view what is in my purse for private security reasons. That being said I do understand Stadiums requiring them for National Security. I researched several purses prior to choosing this one & I made the right choice for me. Especially as it’s quite versatile.
customer_reviews.author: xeno

customer_reviews.title: Concert Ready!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear bag for a stadium concert and loved this one because it had some shape and style. It also holds a LOT for being normal purse sized bag. I swapped out the strap with another purse I already had to make it more comfortable and adjustable. It worked perfectly for the concert and I plan to use it again whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Udell

customer_reviews.title: customizable stadium bag
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love this item but it was perfect for its purpose of being used for a concert. It’s a bit stiff, but I suppose that is a positive, rather than having a flimsy bag. Like many reviewers, I changed the strap and bought and cute pouch to use inside of it to make it look better — only to be told the pouch wasn’t allowed (so beware of that for your event). All in all, good quality and served its purpose. I get lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: Have had it for a year and still looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go to a concert, but it quickly became my regular go to bag. It's very cute, and has enough space to carry several things in it. I haven't had any issues with it in the time I have had it which is about a year and a half. I am planning on buying a similar one for when the inevitable happens.
customer_reviews.author: P Garza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stadium Bag
customer_reviews.text: Needed a clear bag for a football game and wanted something that would also be stylish. This bag is the perfect little crossbody to take with you to a stadium; I made it through security with no issues. It reminds me of the Coach Cassie and Louis Vuitton Pochette Metis with its shape and size. You won't be able to take everything with you but it is the right size for your main essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Purse
customer_reviews.text: Best clear purse ever. I used it for a sporting event last evening and received at least 10 compliments. It looks amazing on.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Loved this purse
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag!! I purchased it for the WMO and worked great!! Super cute and the perfect size! I did change out the strap on the purse with a brown one which changed the whole look! Totally would buy again! You can kinda see the purse in those photos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is cute, yet functional. My job went to a clear bag policy and I wanted to wear something cute. This fits the bill. I have received so many compliments! This bag is well made and stylish. I wouldn’t be embarrassed to wear it outside of the workplace.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COOL DIFFERENT STYLE BAG,
customer_reviews.text: LOV LOV LOV LOV LOV this bag . So much room.. 12 inch long, about 7 8 inch high, more like a briefcase style.. but still so cute.. I use it as a weekend bag.. dl, money, cellphone compact, lipstick, lotion, sanitizer and cell phone charger let's go.. alot of where did you buy it... so happy with it.. wish the crossbody strap was a tad longer..
customer_reviews.author: Eternalcruz

customer_reviews.title: Cute, transparent purse with gold buckle
customer_reviews.text: This purse is a cute transparent purse. The shoes that I was trying to match had silver buckles so, I returned this purse because the latch is gold.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse, very on trend and goes with everything. I always get compliments on this and questions about where I purchased it. The hand strap works well if you want to carry it and the should strap works for a hands free fit.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Price

customer_reviews.title: Overall a cute bag, especially for spring/summer, and makes an amazing gift!!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: The only slight, minimal flaw with this bag is that occasionally the turn-lock clasp can be a tad bit troublesome to close. Regardless, I did gift this to my little sister and she loves it, being able to showcase her cute wallet/makeup bag/sunglasses/etc. and attach her favorite key chains/bag charms to the side clasps, giving the bag much character from its contents. I've even borrowed it myself a couple times, and if they ever came out with this bag but with silver hardware (as I'm more of a silver metal person), I would purchase it in no time; I find it so adorable. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: The black color is cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a different clear bag from another seller. I liked it so much I tried this one in black. I returned it. It looks very cheap. The gold clasp also really brings down the look of it. Maybe the clear looks better as I see some good reviews but stay away from black color. Honestly looks like something from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and it is a perfect fit for the Louis Vuitton Toiletry 26. There no room for anything else so if you want a perfect or second skin look, this is it. I like the weight of the material, the gold fixtures are a nice touch, nicely packaged with a bubble in the inside to hold its shape, a simple bag cover to keep the bag in. The strap is clear with a clear handle on the top. It’s a keeper for me.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. It's the perfect compliment to my perspex heels. Came securely packaged in plastic and it includes a duster for protection. Clear strap included. Gold hardware. Probably only big enough to hold an iPad Mini but that's not a deal breaker. My mother saw it and loved it, so I just purchased another one for her.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I like this purse. However, when I opened the package, something fell ou - wasn't sure what it was. Checked the floor - couldn't find anything. Checked the purse, but didn't see anything missing. Two days later I stepped on something. It was a small screw. I looked at my purse again and found that it was a screw that was supposed to be attached to the latch. I tried to put it back but the thing was stripped. Was not happy. I think I will Super Glue it where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a stylish game day!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in for football season! Absolutely love it! Great size and seems really well made. Nice metal twist closure, and metal, rotating strap attachments. Perfect cross body length! Really really happy with this purchase, especially because of the low price!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great clear bag
customer_reviews.text: A quality bag for its price. It's a good size that is not too big yet enough for all necessary personal items for going to concerts. The detachable strap makes it possible to swap with other straps or chains for a different look. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Wang

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Just bad!
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived today and when I took it out of the pouch the handle was torn in the corner and wrinkled up. I at least expected that it would look ok, it did not. I am sorry I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: natalie53

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Vegas :)
customer_reviews.text: Love ot exactly what i was looking for :) and really good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for game day
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my purchase. I bought this purse for my upcoming NFL game. It’s the perfect size and very fashionable. I love this purse
customer_reviews.author: Mona20

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, Perfect for Sporting Events!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to fit everything I needed and to pass the requirements at the football stadium I went to for Copa America. Multiple stadiums have allowed me to use this bag which came in handy. The top handle and strap made it easy to carry around with no issues as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it's a clear purse. What more can you expect?
customer_reviews.text: As far as a clear bag goes, this one is great! I bought it due to my school's clear bag policy for football games and didn't really have any expectations, but the bag is sturdy and seems to be pretty well made. I got tons of compliments, mostly from random girls on the street who liked this bag better than the tote bags they had. I don't think I'd use it outside of events which require a clear bag, but it serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Ivey Sumner

customer_reviews.title: you can see a patch(streak) on the plastic
customer_reviews.text: The item , arrived as pictured. I liked it. When I looked closely at the plastic, it appeared at if it has streaks. It looked like when you clean a mirror and it leaves streaks or it looks foggy ... just liked that. I tried to wipe it off but it it did not come off, it was the way the plastic was. it does not bother me...
customer_reviews.author: Mafe

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is extremely stiff even though yes I know it’s a plastic material it’s very very hard and all I can fit is my small Louis Vuitton wallet and a tiny tiny bottle of hand lotion my keys don’t even fit in it! I wish this bag was a bit better made! Also smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.author: stevie geisler

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this bag long and it is already cracking. I rarely use it too. I can't imagine if I used it daily, it probably wouldn't last but a month.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: For clear bag policy at Mississippi State University
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional for what I bought it for which is to take to my football games because we have a clear bag policy. It fits my large wallet, sunglasses, makeup bag, keys, and phone. It's a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Fits lots
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this purse, it obviously matches w/ all, airport and @ baseball stadiums I have no problems. 👌🏽 I haven’t used strap yet, but love it all. Matches it w/ some clear makeup cases for inside and 2 card holders for inside.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Heidiliz Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clear bag
customer_reviews.text: I get a ton of compliments on this bag. It’s perfect for concerts and sport games. You can even change the straps up.
customer_reviews.author: lovetimez2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for concerts, festivals and sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. The strap is comfortable and removable if you want to. Also it is the perfect size for the things you would take to events. And it is approved gear for NFL games and rock festivals. I took it to Rockville and it worked out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute purse and the price is good. Will use it and let you know. Update: I love it! It’s pretty but I wish there was like a purse inside 💗💗
customer_reviews.author: Zooza Akbar

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Levi stadium has a strict bag policy so i needed a clear bag and this is so much more! I purchased it thinking I’ll just use it for football games but I’ve already worn it on other occasions. It’s too cute not to
customer_reviews.author: FiveOh Bully

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a secured venue in which I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a secured venue in which I was limited to a purse the size of a brick and was told that a clear bag would expedite my ingress. I got many compliments, much nicer than any other clear plastic bags I saw there
customer_reviews.author: Julie Julie Julie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and stadium regulated:)
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went to a college football game. With all the stadium new regulations on purses the clear bag was perfect. The bag was stylish and held my things as well as my husbands eye glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this purse.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to attend a venue where you can't take a purse. It is sturdier than I expected. Someone else said the long strap is not long enough, but I think it is fine. Certainly much nicer than carrying a clear baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to an event where it rained and snowed ALL night, this kept everything dry! Fits a ton of items and great style for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli House

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a stadium event. I’m so glad I went with this option. It’s just the right size, stylish (I received multiple compliments), and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Squared

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Perfect for collegiate and professional sporting events where purse restrictions apply. Not completely sure the short handle is necessary but not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: luvobx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Event Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I need for concerts & sporting events. Well designed bag with ample room & meets the specifications of the clear bag policy.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much i purchased 2. Stadium approved & easy to change the straps
customer_reviews.author: Samisha F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice purse
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse. Not to small not to big. Holds just enough and looks cute to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this season of virus to wipe off easily
customer_reviews.text: This handbag is ideal to quickly find items and wipe down after each use
customer_reviews.author: catwoman

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Gorgeous Gorgeous !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my purse. I am a big fan of see through bags. I have to say this bag is such good quality!!! The stitching is really good & it’s beautiful & stylish ! It looks super expensive !
customer_reviews.author: Batel Benhamo

customer_reviews.title: Cute for Clear Purse
customer_reviews.text: This bag is about as cute and fashionable as you can get with a clear purse. Bought it for a stadium event where there is a clear bag policy. It’s not too large but has plenty of room to hold everything you would typically need to carry ... phone, make up, money/wallet, etc. It’s well-made and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree M

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super cute and great quality! I get compliments every time I wear this! Doesn’t look cheap at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.text: I think it’s an awesome bag. The only thing is the bag top holder is bent and I can’t get it to unbend. Other than that it serves its purpose will update this post with time
customer_reviews.author: Roxane

customer_reviews.title: Bought one as Mothers Day Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 one for myself and one as a Mother’s Day’s Gift! I absolutely love it! Perfect size and easy to clean during these difficult times where minimalist is best! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag it’s very convenient and goes with everything. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Davis03

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice purchase. Will work perfectly for my project. It was even nicer then I expected. Well packaged and delivered on time!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer123

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful I love this bag perfect size beautiful packaging will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Concerts
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and durable bag. Perfect size for concerts and their size restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag bought gold chains to make it an impressionable piece for game days and the clear bag policy!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Cute. 💕👛💕Great quality. Right size. Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Love it. Perfect size to fit iPhone 8 Plus, wallet, & sunglasses.💕 I switched out the strap & it looks even better. Can’t wait to use it!! 👛
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: It was too stiff and I didn't like the strap
customer_reviews.text: I returned this purse. It was too stiff and I didn't like the strap. Other viewers mentioned using a different strap but I didn't have one that I thought would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Go Gadget Gurl!

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, this is much more durable than I had anticipated! I've been wearing it everyday for the past week and it holds up very well. I can fit quite a bit in it, too. Well worth it for it's price, I highly recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and functionality is good
customer_reviews.text: Good for NFL games and other venues that require clear bags!
customer_reviews.author: william billing

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. Straps are sturdy when I use them it constantly slip off shoulder. Don’t expect too much.
customer_reviews.author: OLSKOOLDIVA

customer_reviews.title: Sized perfect and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is nice for the price and it's simply classy.
customer_reviews.author: MiArchAngel

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight n professional looking for workplace . Easy to lock with click n turn function.
customer_reviews.author: Eifun

customer_reviews.title: Crossbody stadium bag is the perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: The crossbody bag is the perfect size for carrying a wallet, cellphone and other essentials.
customer_reviews.author: West River Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Clear bag arrived on time as described. I can fit my LV pouchette inside! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s just what I was looking for the hold my Neverfull pouch. For the price it’s a no brained. Nice and thick and now I don’t have to worry about getting hand sanitizer on my bags.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice purse
customer_reviews.text: Nice purse. Great for sporting events that only allow clear bags. Nice style and design.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. it is so pretty and hold a lot of stuff. it was a perfect bag to bring to my first rams game.
customer_reviews.author: therese goebel

customer_reviews.title: Did the job.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for what I needed it for to use at concerts, local fair, sporting events. It is hard to close when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: ... shorter than expected so its hard to wear it like a crossbody purse
customer_reviews.text: The strap is shorter than expected so its hard to wear it like a crossbody purse
customer_reviews.author: jeaninne

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I work retail so it's great for distant bag checks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Bought it for a concert. Recently bought a “transitional” guitar strap (also from amazon) that I plan to use on this bag to add a little style. Bring on the clear bag events.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly asked about this bag everywhere I go. Convenient for concerts and games
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for gamedays
customer_reviews.text: Great for gamedays because it is one of the biggest, yet good looking, clear purses I have found. Comes with a small leather pouch to put private things inside
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for costume or everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag. Perfect size and the handle or strap option is great. I bought it to hold my accessories for a Mrs. Potato Head costume, but use it anytime to match an outfit if I don’t have a purse in that color!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Summer Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is my bag for the summer!! I get compliments every time I wear it! I think I may buy another one because the clear may just get a little cloudy over time.
customer_reviews.author: The Destiney

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size and it's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this purse and she wears it for the soccer games at the stadium (since they have the clear bag rule). It's the perfect size and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: klf17

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a concert at Soldier Field, cute bag. Will definitely be used again.
customer_reviews.author: chicago

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you work in a Casino
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this purse! I get compliments on it constantly. Only negative thing I have to say is when you first get it out of the packaging it smells so terrible. Just let it air out and it’s gone. I did, however, change the purse strap for my black strap.
customer_reviews.author: Ravyn

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty and classy!
customer_reviews.text: I got my stadium approved pretty purse very quickly! It looks beautiful. I love how it closes and locks shut. And I am going to be proud sporting it at the Taylor Swift Reputation Tour in September!!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Scott

customer_reviews.title: happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy that I made the purchase. Good quality. Interesting to DIY. Yay
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: Great for football games
customer_reviews.text: This item is snazzy, legal in stadiums and holds plenty. I could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: Pat Brey

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought but good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good purse if you need a big clear purse, it's a lot bigger than it seems but it's very sturdy! The strap is also kinda awkward but I just replaced it with another strap from my other purses and it was fine!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Norris

customer_reviews.title: Security checks are 10x easier with this bag!
customer_reviews.text: My friend has been using this bag for concerts and disney runs and I’ve seen how easy security check is for her so I had to snag me one!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This purse is a must have!! I dressed it up with a twilly and a pink purse strap! Love how it has a designer look to it . Purse is good quality and great price :)
customer_reviews.author: CTX

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the stitching on the plastic seems very durable so it doesn't look or feel like it will far apart on me anytime s
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cute and stylish. Keeps all my stuff in place. The quality of the stitching on the plastic seems very durable so it doesn't look or feel like it will far apart on me anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: trey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the NFL clear bag policy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and functional. Perfect for the NFL clear bag policy!
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Protects Our Daily Essentials From Covid!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Versatile. Can be worn crossbody, shoulder or hand-held. Lightweight. Perfect for wallet on chains...protects them from the virus. That’s what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Addict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Stadium use for the stylish fan!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a football game. Worked great, met the requirement but was more stylish then what is typically used for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sweeting
